data.title: Everimpact
data.description: Our mission is to make it easier for cities and companies to measure greenhouse gas emissions, identify opportunities to reduce emissions and finance needed investments.

data.title: Habitat Energy
data.description: Habitat Energy provide optimisation and trading services to owners of battery storage and other flexible energy assets. We focus primarily on grid-scale assets, transmission or distribution connected, typically 10 megawatts and above that are pursuing a merchant business model, buying and selling power in the Day Ahead, Intraday and Balancing markets.

data.title: Smart Buildings Alliance
data.description: A unifying approach for the Smart Building in the Smart City: the aim of the SBA association (Smart Buildings Alliance for Smart Cities) is to organise the promotion of the Smart Buildings sector within Smart Cities bringing together a group of industry players.

data.title: Elli
data.description: Elli is the "Electricity Life" brand owned by VW group, announcing their [intention to become a power supplier](https://www.volkswagen-newsroom.com/en/press-releases/volkswagen-to-become-a-power-supplier-4551)

data.title: GRESB
data.description: GRESB mh, not sure this is a corp, or an org, their mission is to enhance and protect shareholder value by assessing and empowering sustainability practices in the real asset sector. Providing environmental, social and governance (ESG) performance on assets. (mentioned in Fabriq newsletter)

data.title: Metabolic
data.description: Metabolic did the Smart Integrated Decentralised Energy (SIDE) systems research published by [world economic forum](https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2018/09/these-dutch-microgrid-communities-can-supply-90-of-their-energy-needs/)

data.title: Spectral
data.description: Spectral a metabolic spin-off (nice domain), worth watching what they do [link on Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jB3hMVYXSKk) they should also have an energy monitoring platform a bit like Fabriq but not sure it’s PaaS

data.title: Carbon lighthouse
data.description: Carbon lighthouse US based Commercial solar consultancy

data.title: kwhanalytics
data.description: kwhanalytics Investment risk management in solar, a platform

data.title: Lumenaza
data.description: Lumenaza software company for energy flow

data.title: Energy Market Price
data.description: Energy Market Price software and bespoke solutions for industrial / consultants / suppliers who need to track energy price (e.g. a dashboard for EDF)

data.title: Engadged Tracking
data.description: Engadged Tracking a new approach to sustainable and ESG investing, ranking the world’s largest listed companies according to their Scope 1, 2 and 3 greenhouse gas emissions each year.

data.title: Carbon Delta
data.description: Carbon Delta funded by climate-kic, companies carbon footprint monitoring / environmental fintech

data.title: Energy way
data.description: Energy way is an Italy based consultancy, my friend Rita Cucchiara in the advisory board

data.title: Brixton energy
data.description: Brixton energy a tiny cooperative installing renewables in south london, I'm sure there's plenty but hey, I'm a Londoner :joy:

data.title: CoEnergy
data.description: CoEnergy by Andre Pinho who's involved in Brixton energy as well, wants to simplify community energy schemas for both investment and management

data.title: Repowering London
data.description: Repowering London is a not-for-profit organisation that specialises in facilitating the co-production of community-owned renewable energy projects. Affiliated with CoEnergy.

data.title: Eco Energi
data.description: Eco Energi UK based service provider / consultancy for transition to sustainable, mainly residential

data.title: Pexapark
data.description: Pexapark is a Zurich based consultancy specialised in PPA deals

data.title: Nispera
data.description: Nispera renewable portfolio performance monitoring, asset management, weather forecast for power, bespoke solutions

data.title: Digital Engineering
data.description: Digital Engineering data analytics services for assets monitoring and forecasting, based in Bristol

data.title: Kyos
data.description: Kyos asset management and optimisation, energy market analytics

data.title: Inspired Energy
data.description: Inspired Energy Manchester based, super big company providing all sorts of professional services for energy distributors, businesses etc.

data.title: D2H engineering
data.description: D2H engineering consultancy company in Indianapolis and UK, several projects in energy including a battery model

data.title: Climate.Careers
data.description: Climate.Careers - job board: a social enterprise that exists to help people align their careers with solving climate change

data.title: Carbon Smart
data.description: Carbon Smart help businesses take the sustainability steps that make sense to them

data.title: Carbon limiting technologies
data.description: Carbon limiting technologies works with industry and government to commercialise low carbon innovations and accelerate clean growth

data.title: Emrgnt
data.description: Emrgnt is a startup developing batteries and renewable projects for landlords, they are probably both product and consultancy, a bit like Spectral (above), founder [Reg Platt](https://www.linkedin.com/in/reg-platt-11a38321/)

data.title: Open Grid Systems Ltd.
data.description: Open Grid Systems Ltd.  is a software and consultancy company providing services to the electrical power industry focussed on model-driven software engineering, open standards and cutting-edge technologies.

data.title: EnergySage
data.description: EnergySage is on a mission to make going solar as easy as booking a flight online. Funded by Clean energy ventures (see business section)

data.title: Better Buildings Partnership
data.description: Better Buildings Partnership is a collaboration of the uk's leading commercial property owners who are working together to improve the sustainability of existing commercial building stock.

data.title: Joule Assets
data.description: Joule Assets empower communities to access cleaner and cheaper energy through an investment platform aimed at implementing clean energy solutions

data.title: Element Energy
data.description: Element Energy is a team of experts based in Cambridge, London, York and Lille who specialise in the intelligent analysis of low carbon energy.

data.title: Masdar
data.description: Masdar , or Abu Dhabi Future Energy Company, is a global leader in renewable energy and sustainable urban development. Masdar means ‘source’ in Arabic. - related article: [How green can a building be?](https://blogs.thomsonreuters.com/sustainability/2019/02/13/executive-perspective-how-green-can-a-building-be/)

data.title: GridBeyond
data.description: GridBeyond enables participation in Demand Side Response, including grid revenue programmes and enhanced energy savings through peak avoidance and trading. Winners of BusinessGreen [Tech Awards 2019](https://gridbeyond.com/gridbeyond-wins-smart-grid-technology-of-the-year-award-at-businessgreen-technology-awards-2019/) in the Smart Grid category

data.title: Greenkeper
data.description: Greenkeper is a consultancy that develops a data-driven tool to analyse performance and inform investment approaches to urban green infrastructure.

data.title: Plan A
data.description: Plan A has developed a Carbon Reduction Software which helps businesses calculate, monitor and reduce their carbon footprint on a monthly basis.

data.title: Natural Capital Partners
data.description: Natural Capital Partners works with clients to deliver solutions that ensure immediate, positive impact on the world’s natural capital. They developed the [CarbonNeutral Protocol](https://www.carbonneutral.com/who-we-are) to provide a clear set of guidelines for businesses to achieve carbon neutrality.

data.title: Cleantech Group
data.description: Cleantech Group provide research, consulting and events to catalyze opportunities for sustainable growth powered by innovation.

data.title: Energy Managers Association
data.description: Energy Managers Association aims to: Improve the standing of the Energy Management profession and those working within it, Establish best-practice in Energy Management, Put Energy Management at the heart of British business

data.title: Bloomberg NEF
data.description: Bloomberg NEF "new energy finance" is the branch of Bloomberg specialised in consultancies around the energy sector, this was a company founded by [Michael Liebreich](https://twitter.com/MLiebreich) in 2004 and acquired by Bloomberg in 2009

data.title: Business green
data.description: Business green uk based media and events in the cleantech world

data.title: The Energyst
data.description: The Energyst magazine featuring latest energy technology and strategies along with articles on legislative and policy changes.

data.title: Greenbiz
data.description: Greenbiz Media company interesting article about long-term sustainability of solar panel recycling

data.title: Green Finance Index
data.description: Green Finance Index an initiative sponsored by the MAVA Foundation, and delivered by Finance Watch and Long Finance, that seeks to encourage financial centres to become greener and develop financial services in a way that enables society to live within planetary boundaries.

data.title: The European Energy Centre
data.description: The European Energy Centre is an Independent Educational Body for the Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency Sectors. Awards the [Galileo Master Certificate](https://www.euenergycentre.org/energy-qualifications/) energy qualification

data.title: The Smart Electric Power Alliance (SEPA)
data.description: The Smart Electric Power Alliance (SEPA)  is a US non-profit organization dedicated to working with electric power stakeholders through the most pressing issues affecting the growth and utilization of smart energy.

data.title: World Energy Council
data.description: WEC define, enable and accelerate successful energy transitions while maintaining a technology and resource neutral global perspective and through the widespread use of a flexible Transition Leadership Toolkit, insight, interactive events and dynamic platforms to delivery strategic moments of impact.

data.title: IEA
data.description: IEA Founded in 1974, the IEA was initially designed to help countries co-ordinate a collective response to major disruptions in the supply of oil, such as the crisis of 1973/4. While this remains a key aspect of its work, the IEA has evolved and expanded significantly.

data.title: UNFCCC
data.description: UNFCCC United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change organises the Conference of Parties, organised the [COP24](https://unfccc.int/katowice) event in Katowice, Poland Dec '18

data.title: The climate group
data.description: The climate group an international non-profit, founded in 2004, with offices in London, New Delhi and New York.

data.title: Carbon Trust
data.description: Carbon Trust an independent, expert partner of leading organisations around the world, helping them contribute to and benefit from a more sustainable future.

data.title: CDP
data.description: CDP is a not-for-profit charity that runs the global disclosure system for investors, companies, cities, states and regions to manage their environmental impacts

data.title: Mission Innovation
data.description: Mission Innovation 24 government consortium, recently presented the SGIA accelerator, ties with B-T ventures

data.title: Ofgem
data.description: Ofgem gas & electricity market authority

data.title: Ashden
data.description: Ashden organisation with award and funding, check the eligibility criteria

data.title: Action sustainability
data.description: Action sustainability

data.title: environmental progress
data.description: supporting nuclear environmental progress , really good newsletter, the guy writes on Forbes

data.title: UK100
data.description: UK100 clean communities

data.title: Royal Society
data.description: Royal Society

data.title: Client earth
data.description: Client earth - check their survey UK 20.8.18 supporting urgent action on climate change: [link](https://www.clientearth.org/british-public-supports-urgent-action-and-litigation-on-climate-change-poll-reveals/) linked from [link](https://www.independent.co.uk/environment/solar-panels-government-cuts-funding-british-tesla-a8500051.html)

data.title: link
data.description: go low carbon contest link

data.title: Michael Liebreich foundation
data.description: Michael Liebreich foundation gives small grants for climate & environment projects among other things

data.title: Carbon culture
data.description: Carbon culture community platform that is designed to help people use resources more efficiently. Doesn't seem super active.

data.title: NIPCC
data.description: NIPCC basically the climate change "negationist", a panel of nongovernment scientists and scholars who have come together to present an assessment of the science and economics of global warming.
350 is an international movement of ordinary people working to end the age of fossil fuels and build a world of community-led renewable energy for all.

data.title: Community Energy England (CEE)
data.description: Community Energy England (CEE)  is a not for profit organisation that represents and supports those committed to the community energy sector. They run a [hub](http://hub.communityenergyengland.org/) with a list of supported projects

data.title: Wolverton Community Energy
data.description: Wolverton Community Energy are a registered society, owned and run by members. Working with individuals and businesses in Wolverton and the wider Milton Keynes area to help them become more energy efficient

data.title: CfR
data.description: CfR is an asset locked community interest company (CIC). Surplus profit is re-invested in supporting further community energy initiatives. CfR is an active member of Community Energy England and Regen.

data.title: PowerPaired
data.description: PowerPaired is a matchmaking service for community energy groups and the owners of sites with renewable energy potential, [in the news](https://communityenergyengland.org/news/first-of-its-kind-platform-launches-in-bid-to-boost-community-energy-s-role-in-achieving-uk-net-zero-emissions-targets)

data.title: Climate neutral now
data.description: Climate neutral now carbon offset platform by United Nations [UNFCCC](https://unfccc.int/)

data.title: Mossy earth
data.description: Mossy earth tree planting

data.title: Choose today
data.description: Choose today UN-verified CO2-reducing projects in developing countries

data.title: Offset earth
data.description: Offset earth funds for tree planting foundations

data.title: Trillion trees campaign
data.description: Trillion trees campaign tree planting

data.title: Atmosfair
data.description: Atmosfair a non-profit climate protection organisation with a focus on travel. We actively protect the climate by compensating greenhouse gases through the use of renewable energies, among other activities.

data.title: Nori
data.description: Nori is a marketplace that wants to create a new way for anyone in the world to pay to remove excess carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.

data.title: Pachama
data.description: Pachama carbon offsetting by afforestation with satellite imagery, funded by [YC W19](https://blog.ycombinator.com/diego-saez-gil-on-how-pachama-uses-tech-to-help-solve-climate-change/)

data.title: Meteomatics
data.description: Meteomatics specializes on the specific needs of the weather sector, energy and trading sectors

data.title: Energy weather
data.description: Energy weather Germany based

data.title: Watt sight
data.description: Watt sight Norway based, meteo and trading forecast

data.title: European power forecasting
data.description: European power forecasting probably a sister company of Digital Engineering mentioned above, Bristol based (same office), focusing on the power forecasting side

data.title: Conwx
data.description: Conwx high-resolution historical weather data and forecast for power / TSOs / asset management

data.title: Sentinel weather
data.description: Sentinel weather

data.title: the eco experts
data.description: the eco experts for PV + battery installations. (Tried to make an enquiry but they’re just a call centre forwarding the contact to an installer, they wouldn’t even send the contact through without installation permission approval from the landlord. Been recommended to check on their website who can install in the area and contact them directly)

data.title: Labrador
data.description: Labrador like uswitch, has an option for green sources

data.title: Amp Energy
data.description: Amp Energy Canadian, assets behind and in front of the meter, backers of Faraday Grid (see above)

data.title: Smartest Energy
data.description: Smartest Energy they have an interesting periodic report in mailing list

data.title: Smarter business
data.description: Smarter business energy broker for business

data.title: Tonik
data.description: Tonik UK utility with 100% renewable electricity, 10% green gas and 90% carbon offset

data.title: Octopus
data.description: Octopus London based aggregator, green easy to switch energy, there is probably a link with reactive-technologies that I haven’t understood

data.title: Trust power
data.description: Trust power another solar / wind energy company to be launched soon

data.title: OVO energy
data.description: OVO energy provider pledging to provide sustainable power and smart devices for heating optimisation, monitoring, etc.

data.title: EDF DSR
data.description: EDF DSR has a solution for demand side response

data.title: Limejump
data.description: Limejump - Assets managers / demand side response platform / battery and other devices

data.title: Flexitricity
data.description: Flexitricity direct Limejump competitors, monetise energy flexibility. I.e. an energy company that enables the balancing mechanism (check [this link on elexon](https://www.elexon.co.uk/guidance-note/balancing-mechanism-bm-units/))

data.title: Ecotricity
data.description: Ecotricity founder [Dale Vince on wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dale_Vince) is worth checking out

data.title: Pavegen
data.description: Pavegen energy capturing pavement / tiles

data.title: Freevolt
data.description: Freevolt ambient low-energy harvesting

data.title: Earthcube
data.description: Earthcube monitoring solutions based on an automated analysis of geospatial information. (funded by climate-kic)
